    • Method Detail

      • get

        public List<String> get()
        Returns:
        a list of available scenarios (name).

      • add

        public void add(String scenarioName,
                String description,
                String applicationName,
                String noraRobotName,
                boolean verbose)
        Add new scenario to your robot. Sample if you add google: -f 2 -s loginSample -d "Scenario that sample." -a google --verbose
        Parameters:
        scenarioName - name of scenario.
        description - is description of scenario.
        applicationName - name of application.
        noraRobotName - Name of your robot generated by NoraUi Maven archetype.
        verbose - boolean to activate verbose mode (show more traces).

      • remove

        public void remove(String scenarioName,
                   String noraRobotName,
                   Class<?> robotCounter,
                   boolean verbose)
        Remove old scenario to your robot. Sample if you add google: -f 3 -s loginSample -d "Scenario that sample." -a google --verbose
        Parameters:
        scenarioName - name of scenario removed.
        noraRobotName - Name of your robot generated by NoraUi Maven archetype.
        robotCounter - Counter class from robot.
        verbose - boolean to activate verbose mode (show more traces).
